content.rendered:
A Family That Plays Together, Stays Together!

Kings club

One & Only 5 Star Private Club In Bangalore.
Become A Member

Why Become The Member In Kings Club?

Enjoy Exclusive Access!

Kings Club membership is limited to those who are invited, either through references or an interview.   Members can easily obtain membership through referrals from their social circle, since they usually refer people who share the same interests. New members become part of an elite network and become part of a community of similar individuals. Our top priority is family interaction and fostering healthy relationships.

 

The development of social skills, leadership skills, and an increased understanding and appreciation of cultural differences provide ample opportunities for personal growth, allowing one to fully explore the possibilities of forming associations with others and pursuing a variety of career goals.

 

Most importantly, as a Kings Club member, you’ll enjoy yourself a lot. Besides providing entertainment, participation in events, sports, and friendship opportunities, it also provides the opportunity for the entire family to get together and enjoy themselves with a great group of wonderful people!

 
  • Limited membership count
  • Club Membership for a family of 4
  • Discounts on all purchases
  • Access to an exclusive community
About Kings Club

750+ Memberships Closed!
Get Yours Today!

Play Video

Welcome to Bangalore’s Club – Kings Club. Discover the most spectacular & beautiful location at Kings Club, which is designed for lifestyle services in the vicinity of Malathalli Lake. Get the family and  friends together to enjoy a luxury environment & several types of sports & leisure services in Nagarabhavi, West Bangalore. We focus on making your life more enjoyable and less stressful. 

 

The Kings Club in Bangalore is surrounded by plenty of lush greenery and natural lighting, making it a prime destination. The rejuvenating climate of the region, along with its friendly atmosphere & delightfully crisp air make it a preferred destination. It makes you feel like royalty when you enter our entrance hall. We provide you with ample green space in our gardens as well as natural light and a gesture of extra care.

 
Don’t miss the chance to build splendid memories with your near & dear ones
Download Brochure

Club Features

You can celebrate large and special events at the stunning King’s Club, which has more than three acres of land and is situated in a magnificent location. 

We have quite the paraphernalia for everything between birthdays, weddings, baby showers, graduation, promotion, or any celebration & have the fun times roll. We have a children-friendly ambiance where you could watch them grow, laugh, & play while they make the best out of the sports & fun activities. Park your car with ease in 200+ parking capacity area which is safe & secure. The best membership club in Bangalore, you can trust.

 

We are well-known for the following qualities:

  • Natural lighting
  • 2 Towers - Sports, Food & Entertainments
  • Access Control & CCTV around the clock Security Entry & Exit
  • Power Backup, Generator
  • Rainwater harvesting, Water Softener, Sewage Treatment Plant, RO Water Purifier
  • Sports, Restaurants & Banquets

Sports

Health & Fitness

Entertainment

Banquets

Restaurant

Club Amenities

Sports

Nestled amongst the greenery of nature, (the sports club in Bangalore,) Kings Club, surrounded all the state-of-the-art facilities that ensure to make you experience relaxing & happiness. Come to enjoy a range of indoor sports & outdoor sports that are sure to delight your fitness soul.

There’s something for everybody! Luxuriate your favorite sports at your own pace. We provide extensive space for your complete sports activities with multiple spaces segregated into several courts for the perfect sport such as:

 
  • Badminton
  • Indoor activities
  • Outdoor activities
  • Table Tennis, & many more
  • Rainwater harvesting, Water Softener, Sewage Treatment Plant, RO Water Purifier
  • Sports, Restaurants & Banquets

Table Tennis

Badminton

Mini Olympic

Indoor Pool

Multi-Court

Health & Fitness

Kings Club is the most prestigious health club in Bangalore. At our modern & advanced fitness center, you can boost your stamina and energy with the latest technology.  By taking the first step to wellness under the guidance of our fitness trainers, you will be guided through a customized program of specific exercises tailored to your needs or just relax at one of our SPA  areas.

 

Modern Gym

Yoga

Dance Studio

Steam Room

Spa

Entertainment

Guests are escorted by our entertainment team through a wealth of sports, entertainment, and relaxation in a fun environment. There are countless activities that can be enjoyed at our entertainment facility, including an equipped swimming pool,  and sports fields. In addition, we offer entertainment services for the hosting of special events including New Year Bash, Dandiya Nights, Diwali, Dusherra & even other festivals & take care of all guests so they can enjoy themselves fully. 

Celebrating Valentine’s Day with your loved ones and enjoying the dance floor with our best DJ is an even more exciting way to celebrate the holiday. Other events will include singers and belly dancers.

 

Cards Room

Billiards

Foosball

Carrom

Toddler Play

Banquets

At the Kings Club, you can choose from a variety of banqueting facilities that ensure your celebration is a memorable experience. At our unique banquet halls, we redefine hospitality by offering an explicit theme for every occasion, such as Engagement Parties, Anniversaries, Birthday Parties, Weddings, Kitty Parties, and Corporate Events, Conference hall, meeting hall, & much more. We will take care of everything from start to finish with our team of highly skilled professionals.

Indoor Banquet

Outdoor Banquet

Rooms

Ample Parking

Restaurant

Featuring an international fine dining experience in a chic ambiance with pleasing décor and music, Kings Club offers you an international fine dining experience. From business dinners to romantic date nights with your significant other, candle light dinner,  the place is the perfect place to relax and unwind.  

There is a multi-cuisine restaurant, café, and bar. Each restaurant has its own distinct flavors with an array of food and drinks to choose from. You can also relax with their favorite foods in our courtyard cafe while you enjoy a delightful afternoon!

Cafeteria

Restro Bar

Sky Lounge

Presidential Lounge

Health and Fitness

Badminton

Table Tennis

Indoor Swimming Pool

Outdoor Swimming Pool

Gym

Billiards

Cards

Spa

Yoga and Dance Studio

Celebrity talks about Kings Club

FAQ

1. How can I get a Kings Club Membership in Bangalore?
All you need to do is just give us a call or drop us a message and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
2. What is the membership fee for Kings Club?

Rs. 5 Lakhs for family of 4 People For 10 Years. (Excl. of GST)

3. Is the membership transferable?
NO
4. If the membership is in my name then how many members from my family are allowed to use the facility?

Family of 4 People for 10 Years (Husband, Wife & 2 Kids)

5. Am I allowed to bring Guests? Are there any charges for them?
Yes but the guest charges will be applicable accordingly.
6. Can I get membership for any one of the sports facilities/Gym/Badminton/Swimming Pool?
NO, there are not any individual charges for any sports facility.
7. Are rooms/accommodation available in Clubs?
Yes, rooms/accommodation are available in Clubs

Members Review
